QuestData.Title: It Rolls Downhill
QuestData.Description: If ya ever gonna be worthy of da Lich King's gifts, ya must learn ta be a great leader - one who be commandin' respect!$b$bI got a task dat gonna refine your command skills, mon....$b$bSumma my minions be trained ta harvest blight crystals from da land below, but dey be lazy and slow. You gonna be in charge o' dem, mon.$b$bTake dis scepter and teach 'em how to get da job done. When dey be under your control, make 'em harvest dem crystals!
QuestData.LogDescription: Overlord Drakuru in Voltarus wants you to use the Scepter of Suggestion on the Blight Geists and then order them to harvest 7 Blight Crystals.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya got my underlings whipped into shape, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Da crystals be pilin' up like never before!$b$bYou keep up da good work, $n. I got more tasks for ya real soon.
